Title: How to determine the official representative candidates
Designer: Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Publisher: Zhongguo minzhu fazhi chubanshe (中国民主法制出版社)
Notes: Part of the series Elections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011).The number of candidates for a direct election should be 1.3 to 2 times the number of deputies to be elected; they moreover must be preapproved by the CCP. The candidates' list must be made public 15 days in advance, the official candidates' list 7 days in advance.
Theme: Political ReformLegal KnowledgeElections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011)
